talk0001:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I can't get so carried away with cleaning! I'm not just
an assistant anymore!

I've been entrusted with this shop, so I need to do
my absolute best!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Yup. I'm talking about the sand seals that
live out in the desert.

You can catch one if you are <clr:0000>really, really
sneaky<clr:ffff>, but even if you pull that off, the
sand seal will bolt the moment you let go.
The wild ones are difficult to handle!
SunaTalk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Sarq!<sp:5:0:0> And what kind do you want?
A sand seal or a sleigh seal?
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Unlike the wild sand seals, ours have
been expertly trained.

They're calm, well-behaved, and adorable.
They can also carry things for you if you
hook them up to a sleigh.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Chat_01>It's <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> to rent one without a
sleigh, or <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff> to rent one with a
sleigh. Are you interested?
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>It's pretty cute that they're so timid, but
the whole "running away" thing becomes
a problem when you really need them!
SunaTalk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Ah, you should really have a shield on
hand if you're planning on going sand-
seal surfing!
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I can sell you one if you want, or you can
use one of your own. Regardless, you
definitely want a shield.
If you buy a shield from me, it'll bring the
total price to <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>. What would you
like to do?
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Wild sand seals can be a bit tricky to
handle. Renting one is much easier...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>It's <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> to rent one without a
sleigh, or <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff> to rent one with a
sleigh. Are you interested?
SunaTalk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Oh. You haven't got enough...


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I would like to give you a special price,
considering all you've done for the town...

But I don't own the shop so I can't
change the prices. I'm sorry.
talk0004:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I dreamt of becoming a sand-seal trainer like Frelly.
I could open up my own rental shop...

But this sand shroud makes such a
dream impossible!

Maybe I should change careers and become an
attendant to Lady Riju's beloved sand seal, <clr:0000>Patricia<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
SunaTalk03: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>All right, I'll see you out.<sp:5:0:0> Take care!
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>The sand seal will start moving as soon as
you've got a grip! Once it starts, you can
guide it wherever you want to go.
SunaTalk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>You'll definitely take a tumble if you try
riding with a shield that has things
attached.<sp:5:0:0> It won't be pretty.
My recommendation is to stick to a plain
shield. It'll definitely glide across the
sands better.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:CustomVasaaq_00>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>Vasaaq!<sp:5:0:0> Welcome to the sand-seal
rental shop!
talk0007:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm glad I sent her back to Frelly over at the <clr:0000>east
gate<clr:ffff>... What a pain she was.

I wonder if she figured out how to reach her
destination... <sp:5:1:0>Hm?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
SunaTalk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh. Believe me, I want to sell you this
shield, but it looks like you've got quite a
few shields in your pouch already.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Why don't you just put on one of those
shields? I'll be right here when you're
all set!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Chat_01>So what do you think? Would you like to
rent one of our sand seals?

It's <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> if you don't want a sleigh,
<sp:5:0:0>or <clr:0000>50 rupees <clr:ffff>for one with a sleigh.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>We also rent sand seals from the
<clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> gate, so visit us there too!
Talk_13: <clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Oh, I wonder if that stranger is still over there too.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0000:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>So long as the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff> is around, we can't rent
out any sand seals.

At this rate, my job might evaporate...


<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>Maybe I should start looking into becoming an
attendant to Lady Riju's beloved sand seal, <clr:0000>Patricia<clr:ffff>.

Right now Padda is looking after <clr:0000>Patricia<clr:ffff>, but she's
a soldier too, so I wouldn't be shocked if she had to
help with all the strange monsters.
If I'm serious about changing jobs, maybe this is
my chance?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Oh, I almost forgot! You need a <clr:0000>shield <clr:ffff>if
you want to sand-seal surf!

We offer shields for a small fee if you
don't have one already.
